Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Disinterested \Dis*in"ter*est*ed\, a. [Cf. {Disinteressed}.] Not influenced by regard to personal interest or advantage; free from selfish motive; having no relation of interest or feeling; not biased or prejudiced; as, a disinterested decision or judge. [1913 Webster]
The happiness of disinterested sacrifices. --Channing.
Syn: Unbiased; impartial; uninterested; indifferent. [1913 Webster]
